items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The Foreign institutional investors (FIIs) offloaded equities worth Rs 3,937 crore on February 17, while domestic institutional investors (DIIs) purchased equities worth Rs 4,759 crore, on the same day.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty suggests a flat start; Asian markets mixed
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Indian markets snapped eight-day losing streak on February 17 to end marginally higher in the volatile session on February 17 with Nifty at around 22,950 led by pharma, metal, financial stocks. At close, the Sensex was up 57.65 points or 0.08 percent at 75,996.86, and the Nifty was up 30.25 points or 0.13 percent at 22,959.50.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Tata Motors, BHEL, Bajaj Finserv, Apollo Tyres, Aarti Pharmalabs, and others on February 18?
items.description: The market may extend the upward move amid consolidation, but sustainability will be key to watch. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: Bharti Airtel, ABB India, Paytm, KIMS, Zomato, Gabriel India, Thomas Cook in focus on 18 February
items.description: Stocks To Watch, Feb 18: Stocks like Uno Minda, Deepak Fertilisers and Petrochemicals Corporation, SBI Cards and Payment Services, GMR Airports, Allcargo Terminals, Suraksha Diagnostic, Anant Raj, Karnataka Bank ,Transformers and Rectifiers India, Vikas Lifecare, Ajax Engineering, Nazara Technologies, and TVS Supply Chain Solutions will be in focus on February 18.

items.title: Pension AUM to hit Rs 118 lakh crore by 2030, NPS may capture 25% share: DSP Pension Fund
items.description: The portion of private sector AUM that’s with NPS is expected to grow to Rs 9.12 lakh crore in the next five years with over 1.5 crore subscribers, said Bhagat.

items.title: Analyst Call Tracker | What's gotten Bajaj Auto firing on all cylinders again?
items.description: Bajaj Auto share price: Electric vehicles now contribute 22 percent to domestic revenue, while the broader eco-friendly lineup, including CNG models, accounts for 44 percent of domestic sales.

items.title: Tax tangle, operational challenges keep new investors away from PMS even as AUM doubled in five years
items.description: Only 22,709 new investors – a mere 12 percent - have joined the PMS bandwagon during last five years, implying that it is the existing investor pouring in more money, and the industry has not able to attract fresh capital.

items.title: Tech Mahindra, NTPC, Zomato shares lead over 400-point recovery on Sensex from day's low
items.description: Tech Mahindra and NTPC shares jumped nearly 3 percent each to become the top gainers on the index.

items.title: Top Gainers & Losers Today: Stocks that moved the most on February 18
items.description: The benchmark BSE Sensex closed marginally lower at 75,967.39, while the broader NSE index declined 0.06% to 22,945.3

items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty, Sensex end flat in choppy session but off lows, smallcaps underperform
items.description: BSE Midcap index ended down 0.2 percent and smallcap index shed 1.7 percent. Trent, IndusInd Bank, M&M, UltraTech Cement, Bharat Electronics were among the top losers on the Nifty, while gainers included Tech Mahindra, Wipro, ONGC, Power Grid and NTPC.

items.title: Live: Sensex, Nifty rebound 0.5% from day's lows in a choppy session | Closing Bell
Rategain shares plunge 8% after second downward revision in growth guidance
items.description: RateGain Travel attributed the revision to deal delays and cautious enterprise spending, especially in the US and European markets.

items.title: GSK Pharma shares jump 15%, extend gains to 2nd straight day after strong Q3 results
items.description: GSK Pharma had reported a consolidated net profit of Rs 230 crore for Q3 FY25. This marks a significant surge of nearly 400 percent from the Rs 46 crore net profit reported in Q3 of previous financial year.

items.title: BHEL shares slip 5% after Ducon Tech initiates arbitration against firm
Gillette India shares skyrocket 16% after Q3 earnings
items.description: Gillette India reported a positive set of Q3 earnings which fuelled optimism among investors, sparking a wave of heavy trading volumes in the counter.

items.title: Welspun Enterprises shares hit 16-week low, extend losing streak to seventh session
items.description: Welspun Enterprises shares dropped about 7 percent at Rs 450, on Tuesday, February 18, in continuation to the effect of its mixed earnings performance for the third quarter of fiscal year 2025.

items.title: Max Healthcare shares gain 3% as UBS upgrades to 'buy', sees 18% upside
items.description: Max Healthcare share price: Analysts suggest that Max Healthcares' plan to double its bed capacity within the next three years is expected to further enhance its growth prospects.

items.title: Borosil Renewables locked in 5% upper circuit, snaps 3-day losing run
items.description: Shares of Borosil Renewables took a hit following the company's weak Q3 earnings performance, encouraging investors to dump the stock over the last three sessions.

items.title: Nifty IT index snaps 7-day losing streak as LTI Mindtree, Infosys shares jump up to 2%
items.description: This comes as the Indian rupee opened 5 paise lower, threatening to breach the 87 mark again against the US dollar.

items.title: Agri Picks Report February 18, 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, India exported 1.1 million tonnes of spices in Apr-Nov, up 11% on year from 955,477 tonnes exported a year ago, according to data from the Spices Board of India. Total exports of spices in dollar terms rose 7% on year to $2.87 billion during Apr-Nov. In rupee terms, exports rose 8% to INR 240.32 billion, the data showed.

items.title: TVS Supply Chains shares gain 8% with major block deal trade
items.description: TVS Motor Company bought stakes after Allanzers Fin Net sold 20,00,000 shares at Rs 128.86 per share.

items.title: Zen Tech shares extend fall to 3rd session, plunge another 10% on weak Q3 numbers
items.description: Zen Tech reported a sharp sequential fall in its Q3 earnings, weighed down by delays in booking certain contracts and a shift in revenue booking to Q4.

items.title: Uno Minda shares rise 2% on JV to develop high-voltage EV powertrain products
items.description: Uno Minda share price: The joint venture will operate within India, with products marketed under both Uno Minda and Inovance Automotive brands.

items.title: Persistent Systems shares gain 4% as JP Morgan advises 'buy the dip' with 30% upside potential
items.description: Persistent Systems share price: JP Morgan expects a 21 percent revenue and 29 percent PAT CAGR over FY25-27, supported by record-high deals driving high-teens revenue growth in FY26.

items.description: Rangebound trading is expected to continue in the upcoming sessions amid elevated volatility. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: US markets open higher; S&P 500 opens 0.13% up
items.description: Since January 1, Dow Jones has gained 4.7 percent, while the S&P 500 has gained 4 percent in the same period.

items.title: Block Deals: Indian Continent Investment sells 511.15 lakh shares of Bharti Airtel
items.description: This sale represents approximately 0.84% of Bharti Telecom Limited's total shares, which stands at 6,088,120,683 shares.
